summary: Another Better Mountains mod who improves the mountaintexture slightly
descriptionHtml:
Here I made my mountains texture mod.

I didn\'t change the texture resolution nor are those completly new textures. I don\'t want to destroy the skyrim feeling with textures that don\'t really fit into the world.

I reworked the diffuse map, its a bit darker now, though really just a bit. Nice side effect you get, is that there is now a bit more snow visible on the mountains. Before some are flaming again, I didn\'t use any sharp filder or such ;)

Also, I did modify the normal map, it\'s now stronger and a bit more detailed than before. I mostly made this one for myself but I thought why not share it, maybe some of you will like it as much as I do.


Btw, for all who might be interested in my other texture mod I\'m working on (more about armors and weapons and some actor models) can check it out here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=652


[color=green][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]

To install the main fiel, copy the mountains folder to: skyrim\\data\\textures\\landscape

To install the LOD update, copy the lod folder to: skyrim\\data\\textures
author: LandsHeer
